actions.name: First Aid
actions.desc:
Target an ally within Range 1-5. Pull yourself towards them, 1 space at a time, until you are adjacent to that ally.
4+: Heal that ally.
6+: Give that ally Shield 4.
First Aid can only target an ally once per turn.

alphaSuper.name: Call In The Cavalry
alphaSuper.desc: Deal 2 damage to all enemies, then deal 2 damage to all enemies.

deltaSuper.name: Inspire Perfection
deltaSuper.desc: Remove up to 4 Status tokens from yourself and each ally you can see. Heal, give 2 Power tokens, and give 2 Iron tokens to each ally you can see, including yourself.
